events.message: I just received my new headphones, but unfortunately they have a noticeable scratch on the left ear cup which is quite disappointing.
The issue was categorized as Product Defect because the customer reported damage on the item received.
The case has been assigned to the product support team for handling the defect report regarding the scratched headphones.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the defect on your headphones. I'm here to help get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratched area so we can assess the damage and find the best solution for you?
Sure, I have attached the photos showing the scratch on the left ear cup. Let me know if you need any other details.
Thank you for the photos. We can either replace the headphones or offer a partial refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement if possible. Thank you for the quick response and options.
We've processed your replacement order and you will receive a shipment confirmation email shortly. Your defective headphones can be returned with the included prepaid label.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement headphones arrived and everything is working perfectly now. Please let us know if you need anything else.
We are closing this case now as the replacement was successfully delivered and the issue has been resolved to your satisfaction.
